title: Ignorance is bliss
review: The fact that I knew quite a bit about this film going in spoiled it a bit for me, though I can still recognize its genius. Hopefully films like this will send a message to Hollywood that they don't need to pour tons of money into goofy special effects to scare a modern audience. This film proves something many of us knew as little kids but have since forgotten: The things you can't see scare you the most.Go see it. Stop reading these reviews.
